title: Field Day 2023
text:
This is a website that describes planning for the ARRL Field Day operation conducted by the Nittany Amateur Radio Club (NARC). Rick Gilmore W3TM created and maintains the site.
Please see separate pages that describe what Field Day is about, the people who are involved, what they do when to make Field Day happen, and some of the material items needed to pull-off an event like this.



Antennas at sunset.








Note



Field Day 2023 is on Saturday, June 24, 2023 to Sunday, June 25, 2023. The event runs for 24 hours beginning at 2:00 PM EDT (1800 UTC) on Saturday to 2:00 PM EDT (1800 UTC) on Sunday.

title: About
text:
Field Day is an event organized by the American Radio Relay League (ARRL), the membership organization for amateur radio operators (hams) in the U.S.
Field Day is an open house to show-off amateur radio to the public, an exercise in portable or field radio operations, and a contest to see which stations can earn the most points.
NARC will operate under the club callsign W3YA with two high frequency (HF) transmitters capable of long-distance communication and a bonus VHF+ station, making this a class 2A (two alpha) operation. The location will be the Pleasant Gap Fire Company training grounds at 475 Robinson Lane in Pleasant Gap, PA.



W3YA Field Day location from http://www.arrl.org/field-day-locator.

title: Calendar
text:
2 Spring 2023

Add info to ARRL Field Day website. W3TM

title: Calendar
text:
3 May 2023

Create Field Day budget.
Food & drink budget.
Porta-Potty estimate.
Equipment estimate.
PR and supply estimate.
Truck rental. N3LI

Secure NARC BoD budget approval. W3TM & K3YV.

title: Calendar
text:
4 June 2023

4.1 4 weeks out (May 28 - June 3)

Add event to web-based activity calendars. H3LP.
Draft and send invitations to elected officials. H3LP.
Reserve Porta-Potty. H3LP.



4.2 3 weeks out (June 4 - June 10)

Draft press release and send to media outlets. H3LP.



4.3 2 weeks out (June 11 - June 17)


4.4 Week of event (June 18 - June 22)

Confirm Porta-Potty delivery details. H3LP.



4.5 Field Day (June 23 - 25)

4.5.1 Friday, June 23

Pick-up U-Haul. N3LI.
Pack equipment at mountaintop station and load into truck.
Set up antennas. H3LP.
80/10m MyAntennas EFWH oriented roughly East/West.
80/10m MyAntennas EFWH oriented roughly East/West.

Test antennas.



4.5.2 Saturday, June 24

Set up radio gear. H3LP.
Set up power. H3LP.
Set up computers and network. N3LI.
Set up food & drink. H3LP.
Set up info table. H3LP.







Warning



2:00 PM EDT (1800 UTC) Field Day begins




4.5.3 Sunday, June 25






Warning



2:00 PM EDT (1800 UTC) Field Day ends





4.6 Week after

Clean logs and submit to ARRL. H3LP.

title: Things
text:
This document provides a list of the material items we need to bring to Field Day.
Here is a link to the Google doc that is being phased out as we develop this site:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AT3f4egvd98MGMu3RWlehmllep89HMRYQFrhlksZyms/edit?usp=sharing

title: Things
text:
Gear

Radios

ICOM IC-7610. NARC1.
FlexRadio Flex 6400M. NARC.
RF power meters. NARC or BUY2.
2x Morse key/paddles. NARC.



Computers

3x HP all-in-ones. NARC.
3x USB cables. NARC.
3x wireless keyboards & mice. NARC.
3x mousepads. NARC or BUY.



Antennas

1x MyAntennas 80/10m EFHW. NARC.
1x MyAntennas 80/10m EFHW. BORROW3. K3YV
2x military mast to reduce mid-antenna sag. BORROW. K3YV & W3TM.



Power
Presuming operation from generator and mains at pavilion.

2x Astron 12 V power supplies.
Bring power for bonus VHF+ station? W3SWL?.

3x power strips. NARC or BUY.
Extension cords. NARC or BUY.
Generator. BORROW. W3TM to ask Dan K9SDW.
Fuel.




Furniture

8x folding tables. NARC.
6-8x rolling chairs. NARC.
2x pop-up tents. BORROW. W3EDP?
3x table-top shelves. NARC.



Cables
